newsitem.title: GERMANY: Homesick Nigerian seizes German pleasure boat.
newsitem.headline: Homesick Nigerian seizes German pleasure boat.

text.p: A tourist seeking a free trip home to Nigeria broke into a pleasure boat on the Rhine but failed to start the engine and crashed about 100 metres downstream, police said on Monday.

A spokesman for the water police said 33-year-old Samuel O., who lives in London, was sober when he commandeered the boat in Cologne on Sunday morning. The man said he wanted to sail all the way to Nigeria.

"He loosened the lines, tried to start the motor but failed, drifted down the river and then crashed between the river wall and another ship," the spokesman said. He is being held in custody while police complete their investigation.
